refsection.title: Introduction
refsection.para: The p:compare step compares two documents for equality.

para.error: It is a dynamic error if the comparison method specified in p:compare is not supported by the implementation.
It is a dynamic error if the media types of the documents supplied are incompatible with the comparison method.
It is a dynamic error if the documents are not equal according to the specified comparison method, and the value of the fail-if-not-equal option is true.

para.impl: If fail-if-not-equal is false, and the documents differ, an implementation-defined summary of the differences between the two documents may appear on the differences port.
